game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the village elder.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden in a nearby cave. The village elder has tasked you with its recovery to bring peace to the tribe.
game.reward: 100 gold coins and a title of honor

task.objective: Explore the cave located west of the village.
task.description: Enter the cave and search for any clues leading to the artifact's location.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian creature protecting the artifact.
task.description: A powerful beast guards the artifact. You must overcome it to claim the artifact.
